attributes.action: address all environmental issues, not just climate change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Climate change is something that it is generally agreed must be dealt with. However, other environmental issues now seem to be being ignored.

It is still important that issues including pollution, habitat loss, species conservation, maintaining biodiversity, waste management, resource depletion, etc. are not forgotten and are given the attention they need.
